content: Glad to see you here. My name is Dima Radushev. I create visual communications with people and for people. I designed and developed this website to help you find info easily about my skills and services. Hope it will be useful journey for you.
These numbers are reflection of my activity, attitude and passion which I carried through all projects I was involved in a few years.
Do you have an idea for a business or own project? Just choose the service you need, and I'll create a visual and functional implementation.
My main advantage is a human-centered approach in production and communication. As a result, it gives rise to all others advantages.
Here you can find some projects I was involved. Visit page with details to find more information about the project you like.
Landing page web design for a startup application development company.
Web design for an e-commerce project that specializes in sports equipment.
Landing page web design for a company which provides detailing services.
Promo website design for one of the largest manufacturers of public transport.
Represent to you with honor brands and companies I worked with. They are professionals and leaders in their sectors of business.
My pride and my glory are my clients and their testimonials. Thanks, guys, for all your words and opportunities, that you gave me.
Thanks, Dima, for the work done! For the attention to every detail, for the endless edits, for tact in communication and creative approach!:) This is kind of person, who loves his work)

I am very pleased with how Dmitry work done! Without extra questions - at a glance - Dmitry completed the task of creating a website prototype in a 2 days deadline! Speed, quality, customer focus and the ability to dive into the details - just on top! I recommend working with Dima. You definitely will not regret!!!
A competent professional, immediately figured out the task and helped identify several usability problems. Very careful attitude to even the simplest tasks. Great job! Recommended!
Specialization: Web design and web sites support
Institution: Interregional Academy of Personnel Management
Specialization: Computer technology in advertising and publishing
In the books I found many interesting things about composition, the effect of color, and the power of typography. Here are some of them.
Wassily Kandinsky - Point and line to plane
Johann Wolfgang Goathe - Theory of colours
Johannes Itten - The art of color
